snippet: Federal authorities said a border patrol agent, Nicholas Ivie, was killed and another was injured in a shooting early Tuesday in Naco, Ariz.
abstract: Federal authorities say Border Patrol agent Nicholas Ivie was killed and another agent injured in a shooting in Naco, Ariz, on the border with Mexico; agents responded to an apparent attempt by someone to cross the border into the United States.

byline.contributor: Matthew Casey contributed reporting from Naco, Ariz.

lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said a border patrol agent, Nicholas Ivie, was killed and another was injured in a shooting early Tuesday in Naco, Ariz.

headline.seo: Border Patrol Agent Is Killed in Arizona
headline.main: U.S. Agent Is Killed and Another Is Injured in Shooting at Mexican Border
headline.print_headline: U.S. Agent Is Killed and Another Is Injured in Shooting at Mexican Border
